pkgmetadata.longdescription: Haversines are not Slow // The haversine is a function used to calculate the distance between a pair of latitude and longitude points while accounting for the assumption that the points are on a spherical globe. This package provides a fast, dataframe compatible, haversine function. For the first publication on the haversine calculation see Joseph de Mendoza y Ros (1795) https://books.google.cat/books?id=030t0OqlX2AC (In Spanish).
